The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please let us remind you that whenever you send any cash money to school, all payments should be presented in the following way:
- In a sealed envelope with the full name of the student, class, event the payment is for and amount of money inside.
- Wherever possible please give the exact amount. We will issue a receipt once the Accounting Team have received and processed the payment.
This will help us to make sure that all money is safely delivered to the department/member of staff it is intended for.
Ekaterina Foster
Front Desk Upper Campus School
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
